references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of diffusion models and its application to image synthesis, a core concept in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces the text-guided diffusion model (GLIDE), which directly inspired the current research on leveraging diffusion models for data augmentation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art diffusion model (Stable Diffusion) capable of generating high-resolution images, a key component in improving the quality of data augmentation.
